headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. Declares Cash Dividend of $1.32 per Common Share for 4Q24, an Increase of 2 Cents Over 3Q24, and an Aggregate of $5.19 per Common Share for 2024, an Increase of 23 Cents, or 5 Percent, Over 2023
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE: ARE) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.32 per common share for the fourth quarter of 2024. The dividend is payable on January 15, 2025 to stockholders of record on December 31, 2024. The common stock dividend for the year ending December 31, 2024 of $5.19 per common share represents an increase of 23 cents, or 5 percent, over the year ended December 31, 2023.

headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. Announces $500 Million Common Stock Repurchase Program
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. ("Alexandria" or the "Company") (NYSE: ARE) today announced that the Company's Board of Directors authorized a common stock repurchase program.
